TeachFX uses voice AI to show educators personalized insights about the learning dynamics in their classroom, helping them understand which of their instructional practices are making the greatest positive impact on student engagement and equity. We're bringing together the best of computational linguistics, machine learning, and education research, to superpower teachers in their work.As Head of Product at TeachFX, you'll be a key leader of our company as we scale, and you’ll help define TeachFX’s product strategy and culture. You’ll build the systems that support our growth, take ownership of projects from inception to completion, and dive into user research, ensuring our products always align with the needs of educators. We are a deeply mission-driven company, striving to develop tech that revolutionizes teacher professional learning -- and we’re looking for a Head of Product who wants to use their skills to power our mission.Responsibilities:Leadership: Play a key role in product strategy, priorities, and culture. Create and evolve the vision for TeachFX's products, ensuring they resonate with our users and application partners. Recruitment: Grow our product team, developing a best-in-class hiring process that attracts talented and mission-aligned engineers. Strategy & Planning: Collaborate closely with senior leadership to set the roadmap and scope projects. Use both qualitative and quantitative data effectively to make strategic product decisions. Implementation: Define and manage projects tasks and team responsibilities. Work closely with product managers, designers, and engineers to discover, define, and launch new impactful features and products. Feedback & Iteration: Always be on the lookout for learnings with user research, ensuring our product remains relevant and beneficial to its users. Data-driven Decision Making: Balance the use of qualitative and quantitative insights to guide product development, ensuring we meet customer needs and further our business goals. Process: Work with the team to set our engineering velocity and culture, ensuring both speed and quality. Culture: Develop a team culture that members are proud to be a part of. Communication: Convey the long-term vision of your team both internally within TeachFX and externally to our partners. You might be a good fit if:You have 5+ years of product management experience with a minimum of 3 years as a senior PM or equivalent You are passionate about cultivating a team. You have experience managing teams of 5+ and care deeply about creating a thoughtful product team culture. You are experienced in hiring top product talent. You are passionate about building diverse, high-performing teams with a broad range of backgrounds, experiences, skills, and perspectives. You're a strong contributor with a solid foundation. You excel in navigating complex scenarios and thrive in a feedback-rich environment. You have an ownership mindset. You've thrived in startup (or startup-like) environments where embracing responsibility is key to success. You're an excellent collaborator and communicator. You value teamwork and enjoy acting as a thought partner to colleagues across the company. You are adept at communicating with both technical and non-technical team members and recognize the importance of documentation. You jive with our mission. You are excited to have an impact on tens of millions of students' lives through your work. TeachFX is an equal opportunity employer and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.Compensation Range: $175K - $225K
